name: GoMobileUX-framework7-vue-starter-app
description: GoMobileUX Framework7 Vue starter app template

scripts.copy-f7: cpy node_modules/framework7/js/*.* www/libs/framework7/js && cpy node_modules/framework7/css/*.* www/libs/framework7/css && cpy node_modules/framework7-vue/*.* www/libs/framework7-vue/ && cpy node_modules/vue/dist/*.* www/libs/vue/ && cpy node_modules/framework7-icons/fonts/*.* www/fonts && cpy node_modules/material-design-icons/iconfont/*.{eot,ttf,woff,woff2} www/fonts

author: Maxartkiller
